trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs"></xref> class.
An enumeration value that specifies scope of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*> as a page, document, or sequence of documents.
trans-unit.target: 一个枚举值，指定的作用域<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>作为页、 文档或文档的序列。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>

trans-unit.source: Based on the scope of defined by `printTicketLevel`, the number of pages or the number of documents associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.
trans-unit.target: 基于的作用域定义`printTicketLevel`，数目的页或<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>与关联的文档数

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default printer settings to use when the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置打印文档时要使用的打印机设置的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Setting the CurrentPrintTicket property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 设置 CurrentPrintTicket 属性不会验证或修改指定<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>为特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>方法来创建<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>这是对给定的打印机有效。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default printer settings to use when the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: 用于打印文档时使用的默认打印机设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the scope of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，指示的范围<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the CurrentPrintTicketLevel property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: CurrentPrintTicketLevel 属性时<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A>属性指定<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>文档输出数</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A></xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>

trans-unit.source: For other CurrentPrintTicketLevel values, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 对于其他 CurrentPrintTicketLevel 值，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A>属性指定的页的输出，其中<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>数</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumeration that indicates the scope of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"></xref> event as for a sequence of documents, a single document, or a single page.
trans-unit.target: 枚举类型的值，该值指示的作用域<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"></xref>与一系列的文档、 单个文档或单页的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of documents or pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.
trans-unit.target: 获取具有<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>的文档或页面输出数

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>, the Sequence property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>属性是<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>、 序列属性指定<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>文档输出数</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel></xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> values, the Sequence property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 为其他<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>值，该序列属性指定的输出以<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>的页数</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of documents or pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.
